summary: Adds a Kate Beckinsale lookalike as a follower to Skyrim, She levels with you, is a combat assassin and is essential and marriage material.
descriptionHtml:
Ever since i saw the Selene savegame character by Venetica back in 2011, i always thought that it would be cool to have Kate beckinsale strutting her stuff in Skyrim. Been looking for a way to convert save game characters into ingame NPCs ever since. Special thanks to Takeruh who helped me make this mod and it was he who suggested that i share kate with all the wonderful users on the Nexus.  This is my first upload ever to the Nexus so pls bear with me if there are any errors. 

so here is Kate, she can be found on the top floor of the Bannered Mare in Whiterun. i hope you guys enjoy her company during your adventures in Skyrim. She is wearing the Dark brotherhood armor at the start.

I am using Coverwomen look 1, CBBE, eyes of beauty Ran\'s eyeliner replacer and Ran\'s headmesh type D incase you do not get the same appearance.

If Kate is popular i might also release Olivia Wilde and Jennifer Lawrence :p


Regards
author: leyasu
